A: What is the full meaning of CPU? (a) Computer Provide Unit (b) Central Providing Unit (c) Central Processing Unit
All the following are early counting devices, Except _________ (a) Stick (b) Beads (c) Abacus
Pascal calculator was invented by _________ (a) John Napier (b) Blaise Pascal (c) Leibnitz
Leibnitz calculator can perform all of the following except (a) Washing (b) Addition and subtraction
How many buttons does a mouse have? (a) 2 (b) 3 (c) 4
The part of the computer that helps us see what is inside is called _________ (a) Input devices (b) Output devices
A common computer pointing device is _________ (a) Keyboard (b) Camera (c) Mouse
All of these are input devices Except _________ (a) Printer (b) Keyboard (c) Scanner
The part of the computer used in sending data into the computer is called _________ (a) Input device (b) Output device
Which of these are input devices? (a) Joystick (b) Light pen
All of these are the types of keys on a keyboard Except _________ (a) Operation keys (b) Numeric keys (c) Alphabet keys
Apart from abacus, which other device was the first mechanical counting device? (a) Phone (b) Calculator
When was Jacquard's Loom invented? (a) 1888 (b) 1980 (c) 1801
The later development of counting devices were mechanical devices such as _________ and _________ (a) Abacus and calculator
When was Napier's bone invented? (a) 1617 (b) 1716 (c) 1960
_________ is a small object that has two buttons and wire that looks like a tail (a) Monkey (b) Mouse (c) Rat
Who invented Jacquard's Loom? (a) Nicolas Jaguar (b) Joseph Marie Jacquard (c) Jacquard Loomba
The electronic machine which receives data, store data and process data to produce information is known as _________ (a) Motorcycle (b) Computer (c) Grinding machine
Charles Babbage Difference Engine can perform _________ (a) Logarithm (b) Addition and subtraction
The Leibnitz multiplier can perform _________ (a) Drawing (b) Multiplication and division
Input devices are used to enter data such as text, pictures and sounds into the computer (a) True (b) False
All other devices like the keyboard, mouse, printer and monitor are connected to the system unit to function together (a) True (b) False
What is used to transfer data such as text, pictures, and sounds from the computer to the outside world? (a) Input device (b) Output device (c) POS
The _________ has letter keys, number keys and symbol keys (a) Mouse (b) Printer (c) Keyboard
Which device is used to play computer games? (a) Joystick (b) Plotter (c) Keyboard
Which device is used to drag items on the screen using a button? (a) Microphone (b) Speaker (c) Mouse
Which of these statements is true about the mouse? (a) A mouse is used to point to items on the screen using the button
The _________ has a rectangular screen (face) like a television. It is used to show words, pictures and films from the computer (a) Compact Disc (b) Monitor (c) Webcam
A _________ is used to transfer sounds from the computer. It can be used to listen to music from the computer (a) Microphone (b) Speaker (c) MP3
A mouse is used to move the page up or down by using the button or wheel (a) True (b) False
B: Input devices are used to enter _________ such as _________, _________ and sound into the computer.
A system unit has a _________ shape.
A system unit contains the processing parts that make the computer _________
The system unit consists of the major _________ that make the computer work.
